abstract: Ralph V. Whitworth’s Relational Investors fund has sold much of its big stake in National Semiconductor over the last three months.
snippet: Ralph V. Whitworth’s Relational Investors fund has sold much of its big stake in National Semiconductor over the last three months.
lead_paragraph: Shareholders of National Semiconductor are uncorking the Champagne after hearing the news that Texas Instruments has agreed to pay $6.5 billion for the company, about 78 percent above where its shares closed on Monday.

headline.main: The Investor Who Missed Out on the Chip Deal
